field_answer.value:
About Hero component

  • Title, Short title, Subhead, Summary, and description can be entered
  • Images can be uploaded via Entity Browser
  • Link is converted into a button
  • Users can see the text on top of each image
  • An editor can choose the background text color, and align text center, left and right and rearrange slides.
  • Images slide automatically
  • As many images as needed can be added
field_answer.processed:
About Hero component

  • Title, Short title, Subhead, Summary, and description can be entered
  • Images can be uploaded via Entity Browser
  • Link is converted into a button
  • Users can see the text on top of each image
  • An editor can choose the background text color, and align text center, left and right and rearrange slides.
  • Images slide automatically
  • As many images as needed can be added
